meanings.definition: The act of bringing together again after being separated.
meanings.sent1: The reunification of the lost siblings brought tears of joy to their parents.
meanings.sent2: The country celebrated the reunification of the divided families.
meanings.sent3: The reunification of the puzzle pieces was a satisfying challenge.
meanings.sent4: The reunification of the scattered books on the shelf was like putting together a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The reunification of the broken vase required delicate care and patience.

meanings.definition: The process of reuniting or restoring unity.
meanings.sent1: The reunification of the student council led to better teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The reunification of the conflicting groups brought peace to the community.
meanings.sent3: The reunification of the mismatched socks was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The reunification of the orchestra created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The reunification of the colors in the painting made it more vibrant.
